statements: SELECT * FROM transaction_history LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_type, amount, transaction_date FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_type = 'DEPOSIT' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT source_account_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transaction_history GROUP BY source_account_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT destination_account_id, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM transaction_history GROUP BY destination_account_id ORDER BY transaction_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_type, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE source_account_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY amount ASC;

SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, amount FROM transaction_history WHERE destination_account_id = '78901234-5678-90ab-cdef-0123456789ab' AND transaction_date >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM transaction_history WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY transaction_type ASC, amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM transaction_history WHERE transaction_type IN ('Deposit', 'Withdrawal') ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT id, transaction_type, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions;
SELECT account_id, account_name FROM accounts ORDER BY account_name DESC;
SELECT transaction_type, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY transaction_type;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND transaction_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit';
SELECT id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT account_id, account_name, account_type FROM accounts WHERE account_type = 'Savings' ORDER BY account_name;
SELECT transaction_type, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY transaction_type;
SELECT * FROM transactions t JOIN accounts a ON t.id = a.account_id WHERE t.amount < 500 ORDER BY a.account_name, t.amount;
SELECT * FROM deposits WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT account_id, amount FROM deposits ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT * FROM withdrawals WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT account_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM deposits GROUP BY account_id
SELECT sender_account_id, receiver_account_id, amount FROM transfers WHERE transfer_id = 1
SELECT * FROM deposits WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT deposit_id, account_id, amount FROM deposits WHERE account_id = 12345 ORDER BY deposit_id ASC
SELECT SUM(amount) FROM deposits WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT transfer_id, sender_account_id, receiver_account_id, amount FROM transfers WHERE amount < 5000 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT withdrawal_id, account_id, timestamp FROM withdrawals WHERE account_id = 54321 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM deposits ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT deposit_id, amount, timestamp FROM deposits WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE balance < 0;
SELECT deposit_id, amount, timestamp FROM deposits WHERE account_id = 3;
SELECT account_id, account_name, balance FROM accounts ORDER BY balance ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM accounts ORDER BY balance DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT account_id, account_name, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY account_name ASC;
SELECT account_name, balance, timestamp FROM accounts JOIN deposits ON accounts.account_id = deposits.account_id WHERE amount > 5000;
SELECT account_id, SUM(amount) AS total_deposits FROM deposits GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_deposits > 10000;
SELECT * FROM transfers WHERE sender_account_id <> receiver_account_id AND amount > 500 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT deposit_id, user_id, amount, deposited_at FROM deposits WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT withdrawal_id, user_id, amount, withdrawn_at FROM withdrawals WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM deposits;
SELECT user_id, amount, deposited_at FROM deposits WHERE user_id = 5 ORDER BY deposited_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_deposited FROM deposits GROUP BY user_id HAVING SUM(amount) > 1000;
SELECT t.transaction_type, t.transaction_amount, u.username FROM transactions t JOIN users u ON t.user_id = u.user_id WHERE t.transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC;

SELECT u.username AS sender, u2.username AS receiver, t.amount FROM transfers t JOIN users u ON t.sender_id = u.user_id JOIN users u2 ON t.receiver_id = u2.user_id WHERE t.amount > 500 ORDER BY t.transferred_at ASC;
